price: Basi nilikukimbieni nilipo kuogopeni, tena Mola wangu Mlezi, akanitunukia hukumu, na akanijaali niwe miongoni mwa Mitume.
arabic: فَفَرَرۡتُ مِنكُمۡ لَمَّا خِفۡتُكُمۡ فَوَهَبَ لِي رَبِّي حُكۡمٗا وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
footnotes: Nikakukimbieni nilipo khofu kuwa mtakuja niuwa kwa jinaya hii ambayo sikuukusudia. Mola wangu Mlezi akanitunukia fahamu na ilimu, kwa fadhila zake na neema zake, na akanifanya mmoja katika Mitume.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fafarartu minkum lammā khif'tukum fawahaba lī rabbī ḥuk'man wajaʿalanī mina al-mur'salīna
